member.name: M:Unigine.FieldAnimation.#ctor(Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Creates a new Field Animation node of the specified size: If the Field Animation is of an ellipse shape, its radius values along the axes must be specified. Otherwise, dimensions of the cube must be specified.
member.param: A size of the Field Animation along X, Y and Z axes in units.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldAnimation.type
member.summary: Returns the type of the object.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldHeight.#ctor
member.summary: The default constructor. Creates a FieldHeight instance with the default size vec3(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f). By default, a heightmap texture is empty. Specify it after creating the FieldHeight by using an appropriate function.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldHeight.setTextureImage(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Image})
member.summary: Sets the given image as the heightmap texture of the FieldHeight.
member.param: Image instance with heightmap for FieldHeight.
member.returns: 1 if the texture is set successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldHeight.getTextureImage(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Image}) const
member.summary: Grabs the texture for the FieldHeight (already loaded to GPU) and saves it into the given Image instance.
member.param: Image instance into which the texture will be saved.
member.returns: 1 if the texture has been grabbed successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldHeight.type
member.summary: Returns the type of the object.

member.name: F:Unigine.FieldHeight.BLEND_ADDITIVE
member.summary: Additive blending mode for the height field.

member.name: F:Unigine.FieldHeight.BLEND_MULTIPLICATIVE
member.summary: Multiplicative blending mode for the height field.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldShoreline.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Creates a FieldShoreline instance with the default size vec3(512.0f, 512.0f, 512.0f). By default, a shoreline texture is empty. Specify it after creating the FieldShoreline by using an appropriate function.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldShoreline.bakeWaterLevel(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Image})
member.summary: Bakes shoreline for the current water level of the global water object and puts it to the specified image. This method generates a shoreline texture by finding intersections of the Global Water object with terrains (Landscape Terrain and Terrain Global)
member.param: Image instance to which the shoreline for the current water level is to be baked.
member.returns: 1 if the shoreline is baked successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldShoreline.setTextureImage(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Image})
member.summary: Sets the given image as the shoreline texture of the FieldShoreline.
member.param: Image instance with a shoreline texture for the FieldShoreline.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldShoreline.getTextureImage(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Image}) const
member.summary: Grabs the texture for the FieldShoreline (already loaded to GPU) and saves it into the given Image instance.
member.param: Image instance into which the texture will be saved.
member.returns: 1 if the texture has been grabbed successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldShoreline.createShorelineDistanceField(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Texture},int,int,int)
member.summary: Creates a shoreline distance field with the specified parameters and puts it to the specified Image.
member.param: Texture to which the shoreline distance field will be put.
member.returns: 1 if the field was created successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldShoreline.type
member.summary: Returns the type of the object.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldSpacer.#ctor(Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Creates a new Field Spacer of the specified size: If the Field Spacer is of an ellipse shape, its radius values along the axes must be specified. Otherwise, dimensions of the cube must be specified.
member.param: A size of the Field Spacer along X, Y and Z axes in units.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldSpacer.type
member.summary: Returns the type of the object.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldWeather.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor. Creates a new empty FieldWeather instance with default properties.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldWeather.setTextureImage(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Image})
member.summary: Sets the given image as the coverage texture of the FieldWeather.
member.param: Image instance with a coverage texture for the FieldWeather.
member.returns: 1 if the coverage texture was set successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldWeather.getTextureImage(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Image}) const
member.summary: Grabs the coverage texture of the FieldWeather (already loaded to GPU) and saves it into the given Image instance.
member.param: Image instance into which the current coverage texture will be grabbed.
member.returns: 1 if the coverage texture was grabbed successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.FieldWeather.type
member.summary: Returns the type of the object.
